title: Soraka can heal jarvans flag
body:
Unfortunately I don't have any actual footage of this, I don't have anyone online for hte next few hours to duplicate it. 

But recently with jarvan getting a bit more popularity (For some reason?) and me playing a lot of Soraka I noticed that you can try to heal Jarvan, and accidentally heal his flag instead...

If you wana test this yourself it's really simple just go into a custom game, level one take your W and have jarvan take his flag (E) and have him place it nearby. Boom, you can heal his flag for some reason? I think this has something to do with the "everything is minions" 'joke' Where the flag might actually be an invisible minion and thus soraka thinks she can heal it.

Should deff be changed, I waste a lot of mana and health trying to heal a jarvan and accidentally hitting their flag cause for some reason the flags hitbox likes to  override jarvans.

replies.body:
Not a bug, it's a feature. Just like healing the minion 2 inches away from your adc right before he dies is a feature HEY DON'T YOU GIVE ME THAT LOOK! MINIONS NEED BACKUP! SHOW SOME RESPECT!

Later they'll be adding heals for wards, inhibs, nexus, dead karthus, baron, enemy jarvan, poros, meeps, bushes, towers (but only when destroyed), "yes" votes, and internet connections. Games don't end, and players don't leave until Soraka says so!

\*high fives Lee Sin\*
With the bug that ward rubble interacts with skillshots atm, I would not be surprised if you could heal it XD

Firstly, it's been a problem since forever, and I agree that it should be fixed

But for now it's an amazing tool to take advantage of and improve as Soraka

A skilled Soraka player will always know how to assess a team fight, lane, trade or situation in a split second when holding down tilde and healing, click champion portraits, or just aiming without either is the best choice.
